base_description: Analyzing the topology, we find 5 nodes and 5 branches in this circuit. For passive elements, the circuit contains 2 resistor(s). For power supply, the circuit has 1 voltage source(s). The circuit also features 2 dependent source(s). No measurements are configured. In total, this circuit comprises 5 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Adjust the resistor 2 parameter from 74m立 to 1m立.
